div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1066 Myrmecium (mod. Cape Karantin), just N of Kerch', Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1960 Burial: c. 300-275 B.C. Contents: 32 AE. Pot hoard Panticapaeum: AE (as BMC 17-18 [16], 23 [12]; unc. [4]) Disposition: Leningrad Brabich, SA 1964, no. 4, pp. 193-5
